snippet: In addition to chugging beer and popcorn, football fans who crowded into the Super Bowl stadium were consuming copious amounts of data from wireless networks. AT&T, the nation's No. 2 carrier, said the data use came mostly from people sharing content...
abstract: In addition to chugging beer and popcorn, football fans who crowded into the Super Bowl stadium were consuming copious amounts of data from wireless networks. AT&T, the nation's No. 2 carrier, said the data use came mostly from people sharing content as opposed to downloading.

headline.main: At Super Bowl Stadium, More Mobile Uploads Than Downloads
